languages.text: Возможно, правительство Идекса помнит Руолдо, человека, отправленного руководить Тассерой?
Perhaps the Idex government may recall Ruoldo, the man put in charge of Thassera?
languages.original_text: Возможно, правительство Идекса помнит Руолдо, человека, отправленного руководить Тассерой?

traits.locale_text: Perhaps the Idex government may remember Ruoldo, the man put in charge of Thassera?
Perhaps the Idex government may remember Ruoldo, the man put in charge of Thassera?
Perhaps the Idex government may recall Ruoldo, the man put in charge of Thassera?
Perhaps the Idex government may recall Ruoldo, the man put in charge of Thassera?
Perhaps the Idex government may recall Ruoldo, the man put in charge of Thassera?
Perhaps the Idex government may recall Ruoldo, the man put in charge of Thassera?

languages.text: Vielleicht kann die Regierung von Idex ja Ruoldo abbestellen, den Mann, der über Thassera herrscht?
languages.original_text: Perhaps the Idex government may recall Ruoldo, the man put in charge of Thassera?

traits.locale_text: Vielleicht kann die Regierung von Idex ja Ruoldo abbestellen, den Mann, der über Thassera herrscht?

languages.text: Le gouvernement d'Idex se souvient peut-être de Ruoldo, l'homme à la tête de Thassera ?
languages.original_text: Perhaps the Idex government may recall Ruoldo, the man put in charge of Thassera?

traits.locale_text: Le gouvernement d'Idex se souvient peut-être de Ruoldo, l'homme à la tête de Thassera ?

languages.text: もしかすると、イデックス政府がタッセーラの統治を任された男、ルオルドを召還するかもしれない。
languages.original_text: Perhaps the Idex government may recall Ruoldo, the man put in charge of Thassera?

traits.locale_text: もしかすると、イデックス政府がタッセーラの統治を任された男、ルオルドを召還するかもしれない。

languages.text: ¿Qué puede decirte el gobierno de Idex acerca de Ruoldo, el gobernador de Thassera?
languages.original_text: Perhaps the Idex government may recall Ruoldo, the man put in charge of Thassera?

traits.locale_text: ¿Qué puede decirte el gobierno de Idex acerca de Ruoldo, el gobernador de Thassera?

languages.text: 或许艾德克斯政府可以将塔瑟拉的总督罗尔多召回？
languages.original_text: Perhaps the Idex government may recall Ruoldo, the man put in charge of Thassera?

traits.locale_text: 或许艾德克斯政府可以将塔瑟拉的总督罗尔多召回？

languages.text: İdex hükûmeti, Thassera hükümdarı Ruoldo'yu tanıyor olabilir mi?
languages.original_text: Perhaps the Idex government may recall Ruoldo, the man put in charge of Thassera?

traits.locale_text: İdex hükûmeti, Thassera hükümdarı Ruoldo'yu tanıyor olabilir mi?
